programme.title: A Machu Picchu Proposal
programme.desc: Katie helps plan her brother's proposal atop Machu Picchu. When the proposal is ruined by spontaneous Chef Carlos, Katie enlists Carlos to help her find the most romantic spot in all of Peru. Stars Rhiannon Fish and Alec Santos.

programme.title: To Barcelona, Forever
programme.desc: As Anna travels back to Barcelona, reuniting with Erica to celebrate her engagement to Nico, she meets a charming farmer and accidentally finds herself engaged to save his family's legacy.

programme.title: Cross Country Christmas
programme.desc: When a snowstorm disrupts both Lina's and Max's holiday plans, they realize they must work together to find a way home -- without taking it out on each other.

programme.title: A Christmas Melody
programme.desc: A single mother moves back to her hometown with her young daughter. Having a hard time adjusting, the daughter seeks help from her music teacher to write a song for the Christmas variety show.

programme.title: Christmas Waltz
programme.desc: A woman makes an unexpected connection with her dance instructor after her storybook Christmas wedding is canceled.

programme.title: A Heavenly Christmas
programme.desc: A workaholic's (Kristin Davis) untimely death leads to her recruitment as a Christmas angel. Her first task is to help a struggling singer (Eric McCormack) use his music to heal old wounds.

programme.title: One Christmas Eve
programme.desc: A series of mishaps disturbs the plans of a recently divorced mom (Anne Heche) for her two kids on their first Christmas without dad.

programme.title: Checkin' It Twice
programme.desc: Sparks fly between a hockey player and a real estate agent after he moves into a cottage in her family's backyard.

programme.title: Holiday Touchdown: A Chiefs Love Story
programme.desc: Chiefs superfan Alana tries to win the Fan of the Year Award as a Christmas gift for her family, falling in love with someone in the Chiefs front office along the way.

programme.title: Three Wise Men and a Baby
programme.desc: Three brothers get the surprise of their lives when they are forced to work together and care for a baby over the holidays.

programme.title: Haul Out the Holly
programme.desc: Emily comes home to visit her parents, only to discover they're leaving for a trip of their own. While staying at their house for the holidays, Emily meets members of the community who want her to join in the neighborhood's Christmas festivities.

programme.title: A Machu Picchu Proposal
programme.desc: Katie helps plan her brother's proposal atop Machu Picchu. When the proposal is ruined by spontaneous Chef Carlos, Katie enlists Carlos to help her find the most romantic spot in all of Peru. Stars Rhiannon Fish and Alec Santos.

programme.title: Christmas Getaway
programme.desc: After a surprising breakup with her boyfriend, a travel writer decides to go on the picturesque Christmas vacation planned for the two of them, alone.

programme.title: A Christmas Detour
programme.desc: Two travelers become linked when a snowstorm grounds their flight in Buffalo. Paige desperately needs to find a way to New York City to meet her fiance's parents, and it's up to Dylan, a fellow passenger and a guy she can't stand, to get her there.

programme.title: A Cozy Christmas Inn
programme.desc: A real estate executive travels to Alaska during the holidays to acquire a bed-and-breakfast, only to discover it's owned by her ex. She's soon falling in love with the town and quite possibly him all over again.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Blanche decides to sell her house, and the roommates prepare to go their separate ways.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Blanche decides to sell her house, and the roommates prepare to go their separate ways.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Dorothy consults medical experts about her chronic fatigue, which raises concern in Rose and Sophia.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Harry Weston recommends a specialist who diagnoses Dorothy's illness.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Blanche's unmarried daughter announces her desire to have a baby.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Rose has to go and get a job when she loses her late husband's pension, where she is confronted for the first time by ageism.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Realizing that he has no friends other than his brother, Frasier makes an on-air appeal for a new pal.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Daphne decides to move into a place of her own after Frasier forbids her boyfriend's overnight visits.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: The football players think they're doomed when Cheyenne serves the wrong kind of potato salad at the traditional pregame dinner.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba's ex-husband becomes jealous when she calls a plumber to fix a faucet; Cheyenne "moons" Van's teammates.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Kyra does not want to spend time with her father since it includes Barbra Jean; Cheyenne and Van plan to move out.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: When Van fails a history test due to the pressure of being a star football player, Reba steps in to tutor him.

programme.title: A Heidelberg Holiday
programme.desc: Heidi Heidelberg receives a dream opportunity to sell her beautiful, handmade glass ornaments at the prestigious Heidelberg Christmas Market in Germany. While there, she meets Lukas, a local artisan who helps her reconnect with her lost heritage.

programme.title: Gingerbread Miracle
programme.desc: A man and an old high school friend try to sell his uncle's business -- a Mexican bakery that's famous for magical gingerbread cookies that grant wishes.

programme.title: A Biltmore Christmas
programme.desc: A magical hourglass sends modern-day screenwriter Lucy Hardgrove to the set of the 1947 holiday movie classic "His Merry Wife!" However, before she can return to the present, Lucy must make things right or threaten to alter the future forever.

programme.title: Sense, Sensibility & Snowmen
programme.desc: Christmas party planners Ella and her sister Marianne clash with client Edward, a not-so-jolly toy company CEO.

programme.title: A '90s Christmas
programme.desc: A workaholic lawyer destined to spend Christmas alone is transported back to 1999 after an unexpected run in with a particularly wise ride-share driver.

programme.title: Sugarplummed
programme.desc: When Emily wishes for a perfect Christmas like the ones found in the popular Sugarplum movies, she's shocked when Sugarplum herself appears to help her fulfill it.

programme.title: Coyote Creek Christmas
programme.desc: An event planner discovers Christmas magic with a charming father-son duo while throwing a themed Christmas party at her family's inn.
